1.content:
Axion newman was at Earth onega, the main earth. Mr. Mr. was causeing mischief. He was looking around a forest, when he was attacked. Someone in a black cloak was attacking him. They never gave him a chance to attack or even defend. the mysterious figure had him pinned.
"Who are you?" He asked. In reply, the figure took it's hood off. Who was it?
1.title: Axion's struggle begins

11.content:
As the figure looked at Axion, it realised who it was. "Hey, Axion, long time no see." With that it took it's hood off, revealing a white tiger anthro.
"Johnathin!" Axion exclaimed. "What are you doing here?"
"To find you, something's wrong. My world is controled by Saal again." Johnathin explaned.
"What! didn't we kill him?!"
"We did, in a different timeline, Mr. Mr. must have interfeared with time. Only you and I remember. He also undid everything you have done."
"Crud"
Now what?
11.title: Johnathin's arrival

choices: The ninja assassin's don't do anything.
12.content:
"My name is Dark Impentus. And I have been hired by Mr. Mr. to take you out."


"What?! Mr. Mr. sent you?!"


"That's right. And now me and my army of ninja assassin's will bring you to your knee's."


"Um. What ninja assassin's? There's no one here but us two."


"Heh. That's just because I haven't summoned them yet."


"Summoned them?" Just then, Dark Impentus says something out loud.


"And all of a sudden, a bunch of ninja assassin's appear out of thin air to do my bidding." And just as he said, ten ninja assassin's appeared out of thin air and surround Axion.


"What the?!" Axion says, shocked.


"Now then, my ninja assassin's...ATTACK!!!
12.title: Dark Impentus.

choices: What have you done to my men?! {New character.}
What have you done to my men?! {New character 2.}
122.content: Dark Impentus waits for something to happen, but when nothing does, he starts to wonder...
122.title: The ninja assassin's don't do anything.

1221.content:
Dark Impentus wonders why the ninjas have yet to attack Axion, and finally asks them.


"Why won't you do anything?!" The ninjas then look at him and say-


"Because we have yet to recive our pay."


"Pay? What pay?! I summed ninja assassin's who would do my bidding. Not ninja assassin's who would do my bidding for a fee!"


"If you won't pay...Then we'll pick our enemy for ourselves." Then they take a coin out of one of their pockets and toss it in the air then grab it.


"If it's heads, we kill Axion. If it's tails, we kill you."
1221.title: Why won't you obey me?!

12212.content:
When they reveal the coin to be tails, Dark Impentus looks at the coin, then the ninjas, then the coin again, then he starts sweating bullets. And finally-


"HELP ME AXION!!!!!" Catching Axion off guard, Dark Impentus runs and hides behind him.


"Hey! what are you doing?!" Axion asks, almost annoyed.


"Please Axion, you have to help me!"


"Help you? You had just summed them to kill me! Why should I help you?!"


"Because 1, that was the past, and 2, if you help me, I'll stop attacking you and I'll tell you everything about Mr. Mr.'s plan to take over the multiverse." In the end, Axion says...
12212.title: Tails.

122121.content:
"Guess he didn't tell you everything, the Demon Prince. Fine, Dragon's flame!"
With that a colum of flam surrounded Axion, a moment later a red-scaled dragon standing about 10', looking almost 20 stood there.

What reaction does this get?
122121.title: Time to show them who's boss

1221212.content:
"Ooo. Ahh." Impentus says as he looks at the dragon that stood where Axion was.


"Is that all he can do?" the dragon then looked at Impentus with an 'What's your problem.' look.


"Okay. Sorry. I'll stop." Impentus says as he turns around.

(The dragon is Axion in his anthro dragon form...)
1221212.title: no freak-out.

info.brief_description: The evil Demon Lord is undoing time! Save the multiverse!
info.description:
There are many realities in our multiverse. All stemming from 1 world, Earth Omega, our world. All but one. Delta Epsilon, home of the Deamon Prince, called Mr. Mr. by those who don't know his true name, Altazar. This maniac is on a quest to take over the worlds or destroy them, to rule the multiverse.
However, 1 boy has been trailing him. Originally 13, at the start of the hunt, young Axion newman, the last member of his world, Sauria, is hunting down the Demon Prince. That started 3 years ago. Now 16, Axion faces a terible problem. The Demon Prince has somehow aquired the ability to undo time, now Axion will need help from new, sometimes supriseing sources, to keep the multiverse from unravelling.
So, what're you waiting for? get in there!

RULES
1) Keep it apropriate
2)No death of characters that just joined, and if you kill off a character, always have an option where they stay alive.
More later
